ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Join the fast paced Product Quality Engineering team. You will partner closely with the Engineering, Program Management and Operations teams to manage our ongoing reliability testing.

ul.li: - Working knowledge and theory of quality methods, design of experiments, statistical process control methods and predictive modeling
- Exceptional statistical knowledge to derive sampling plans and projected failure rates
- Technical systems knowledge related to electronics and mechanical assembly
- Data-driven and results-oriented approach to problem solving

div.p: - Ensure ongoing reliability test readiness for product from ramp through end of life - Own and drive key metrics - Develop and implement processes to enhance quality, capacity and efficiency - Provide regular VP level communication of program status - Manage ongoing reliability test execution - Manage quality escalations - Statistical data analysis to provide risk assessments - Conduct reviews of Field/Factory Quality Data - Support and visit ongoing reliability test labs as required
BS or MS degree in Engineering 5+ years of industry experience in manufacturing or development of electronics

Experience working with high volume international manufacturers and traveling to manufacturing sites Third party production quality & process management experience Exceptional ability to build relationships Clear & consistent communication Project management experience Enthusiastic and motivated Experience performing reliability testing including Mechanical Stress Tests, Shock/Drop/Vibration Testing, Environmental Testing Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English Ability to travel internationally 20%.
